fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, slither outside someone's house. They will be scared of you and walk back to their own house. In other words, they will be forced to visit themselves. They will know they were scared.
- Bite a player. Their ability will cease to function for this night and the next two nights, but they will not be notified. You may only use this once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Slithering outside someone's house is astral, since you're keeping your distance and technically aren't coming inside.
